item.title: Reference Shenanigans
item.description: A while back, I was working on some Unreal C++ code involving a tree traversal and a hash map used for intermediate information when I encountered a subtle bug (which of course feels obvious in hindsight). At the time, I had lost the better part of the day to the issue, but it actually led me to some interesting conclusions so I thought it’d be fun to try to present it here in a somewhat generalized and simplified way.
